summary.span: 支持 控件并提供一个接口，使数据绑定控件可以对业务对象和数据对象执行数据操作。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data operations with business and data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于通过数据绑定控件，而不是作为页面代码中的可编程对象使用。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 类实现的数据功能控件，其中包括， ， ，并操作、 排序、 筛选和设置的管理视图中保存状态。The class implements the data functionality for the control, including the , , , and operations, sorting, filtering, and management of settings kept in view state. 一个对象创建的每个实例类在运行时。A object is created for each instance of the class at run time. 对实例的数据操作的调用类的实例由处理对象。Calls to data operations of the instance of the class are handled by the instance of the object. 页面开发人员不会访问的实例直接类。Page developers do not access the instance of the class directly. 控件开发人员可以通过扩展来创建自定义数据控件和类。Control developers can create custom data controls by extending the and classes. 类通过使用反射的业务或数据对象上调用方法来执行数据操作。The class performs data operations by calling methods on business or data objects using reflection. 在运行时，控件创建由标识类型的实例属性，然后为数据操作调用适当的方法。At run time, the control creates an instance of the type that is identified by the property, and then calls the appropriate method for the data operation. 实例化的对象不在内存中缓存。The instantiated object is not cached in memory by the . 创建和销毁每个数据方法调用的对象。The object is created and destroyed for every data method call. 该方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，不创建实例，但仍然会调用数据操作方法。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance is not created but the data operation method is still called. 不直接公开到由页面开发人员控件。The is not directly exposed to page developers by the control. 相反，属性和方法通过访问。Instead, the properties and methods of the are accessed through the . 例如，的属性设置通过设置属性的。For example, the of property is set by setting the property of the . ## 检索数据Retrieving Data 数据源视图执行的最基本操作是从基础数据存储使用的数据检索方法，检索数据项的集合。The most basic operation that a data source view performs is data retrieval from the underlying data storage using the method, which retrieves an collection of data items. 通过实现以下数据检索方法、 属性和事件对象，并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following data retrieval methods, properties, and events are implemented by the object and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 更新数据Updating Data 对象通过调用由标识的业务或数据对象方法支持的数据更新属性。The object supports data updates by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 自动执行更新，如数据绑定控件并控件，将其参数中的传递接口，视图对象将合并这些参数是任意参数在中找到集合。Data-bound controls that automatically perform updates, such as the and controls, pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 通过实现下列更新方法、 属性和事件并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following update methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 插入数据Inserting Data 对象支持通过调用由标识的业务或数据对象方法插入新的数据行属性。The object supports inserting new rows of data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 自动执行插入，如数据绑定控件和，将其参数中的传递接口，视图对象将合并这些参数中找到的所有参数集合。Data-bound controls that automatically perform inserts, such as the and , pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 以下插入方法、 属性和事件由实现并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following insert methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 删除数据Deleting Data 对象通过调用由标识的业务或数据对象方法删除数据的支持属性。The object supports deleting data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 自动执行删除操作，如数据绑定控件并，将其参数中的传递接口，视图对象将合并这些参数中找到的所有参数集合。Data-bound controls that automatically perform deletes, such as the and , pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 下列删除方法、 属性和事件由实现并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following delete methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 筛选和排序数据Filtering and Sorting Data 动态筛选器数据时，数据检索是功能更强大。Data retrieval is more powerful when you can filter the data dynamically. 筛选仅受控制如果方法将返回或对象。Filtering is supported only by the control if the method returns a or object. 可以使用和属性应用到数据检索动态筛选。You can use the and properties to apply dynamic filtering to data retrieval. 这些属性由实现对象，并直接通过公开其向数据绑定控件和其他调用方的控件。These properties are implemented by the object and exposed directly by its control to data-bound controls and other callers. 您可以检索与数据进行排序通过对数据进行排序在内存中检索到。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the by ordering the data in memory after it is retrieved. 排序仅受控制如果方法将返回或。Sorting is supported only by the control if the method returns a or . 属性始终返回`true`，因为不能确定哪种类型返回的而不会调用该方法的方法。The property always returns `true`, because the cannot determine what type is returned by the method without calling the method. 属性语法是相同属性。The property syntax is the same as for a property. ## 跟踪视图状态Tracking View State 实现接口并使用视图状态来跟踪跨页请求其状态。The implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 实现， ，和提供方法来启用该控件的视图状态跟踪。Implementation of the , , and methods are provided to enable view state tracking for the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将调用构造函数方法以返回具有指定的数据源视图的新实例`viewName`参数。The constructor is called by the method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `viewName` parameter. 控件是仅有一个关联在任何时间，并始终将视图命名`DefaultView`，尽管此命名限制规定控制，不。The control is associated with only one at any time, and always names the view `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not the . 您可以重写方法，以支持具有不同的命名约定的视图。You can override the method to support views with a different naming convention. 对象，它通过传递`context`由数据源视图来访问参数对象，如和属性。The object that is passed by `context` is used by the data source view to access parameter objects, such as and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`true`，如果属性设置。The property returns `true`, if the property is set. 返回的计数的方法应返回的总行数可以进行分页，不在页面中的行数。The method that returns the count should return the total number of rows that can be paged, not the number of rows in a page. 数据绑定控件使用可分页若要确定如何呈现分页控件的行的总数。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 例如，多少数字呈现页导航按钮在控件页导航。For example, how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 分页支持的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on paging support, see . 的调用过程中检查属性方法，以确保数据源控件支持所有功能，通过设置的各种请求属性。The property is checked during a call to the method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为控件仅支持对数据进行排序时方法将返回， ，或对象时，视图对象不能确定是否将排序支持直到方法调用，并返回。Because the control only supports sorting data when the method returns a , , or object, the view object cannot determine whether sorting is supported until the method is called and returns. 出于此原因，属性始终返回`true`。For this reason, the property always returns `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在操作期间，当基础数据存储中某行的数据更改时， 控件如何执行更新和删除操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying data storage changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 值。

span.span: The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否将旧的和新值的参数应用于`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 有关示例，该方法是否由指定属性返回对象包含列`Name`和`Number`，并属性设置为值，用于创建参数`Name`并`Number`为`Update`方法。For example, if the method that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果属性设置为值，参数创建具有名称`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，并`original_Name`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created with the names `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Name`. (取决于原始值的参数的确切名称。)然后确定方法是否在指定属性具有相匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the .) The then determines if the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是数据存储区使用的控件如何读取和在多个客户端访问和操作同一数据存储区中更改数据的技术。Concurrency control is a technique data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并呈现给用户，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据，并呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果两个用户更新的数据，并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会出现某种意外的结果，因为两个客户端可能会更新相同数据的不同值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过设置属性设置为值，`Update`方法然后可以比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并在必要时处理它们，新旧值。By setting the property to the value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为-1，表示已删除的行数未知。The default value is -1, which means that an unknown number of rows were deleted. 若要返回不同的值，设置的属性对象的事件处理程序。To return a different value, set the property of the object of the event handler. 通常返回的受影响的行数`Delete`业务对象，而该值的方法是从可用的属性参数的事件处理程序。The number of affected rows is typically returned by the `Delete` method for the business object, and that value is available from the property of the parameter of the event handler. 方法调用方法，传递`keys`和`oldValues`集合。The method calls the method, passing the `keys` and `oldValues` collections.

span.span: Occurs when a operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以检查返回值的值和输出参数也可确定后是否引发了异常操作已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性中有与事件相关联的对象。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，使用指定的方法执行操作属性，在中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委托调用以处理事件之前执行操作，和`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托调用以处理事件之后操作完成后，为执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是抛出，它由处理此委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查的实现`EmployeeLogic`中间层业务对象，它将使用此代码示例，请参阅。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁指定的方法的每次调用属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 您可以处理事件以使用之前指定的方法的业务对象调用属性。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理指定的方法后，将引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. 该方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，永远不会创建业务对象，无法处理这些事件。If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果业务对象控件的工作方式与实现多个方法或函数具有相同名称 （方法重载），尝试调用正确的一组条件，其中包括参数根据数据源控件在集合。If the business object that the control works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果中的参数集合不匹配的方法签名的数据源将引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the method signature, the data source throws an exception. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，使用指定的方法执行操作属性，在中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委托调用以处理事件之前执行操作，和`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托调用以处理事件之后操作完成后，为执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是抛出，它由处理此委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查的实现`EmployeeLogic`中间层业务对象，它将使用此代码示例，请参阅。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和类型中包含的参数集合的名称和参数中指定的方法的类型必须匹配属性签名。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 受影响的参数名称属性，并且区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case sensitive. 使用提供的参数，如数据绑定控件时并，则控件自动合并具有提供的这些参数的集合中显式指定任何参数数据绑定控件中。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: , if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过分页控制处理通过设置， ， ，和属性的和定义`Select`使用适当的参数的业务对象中的方法。Paging by the control is handled by setting the , , , and properties of the and defining a `Select` method in the business object with the proper parameters. 当属性设置为`true`，则集合包括请求的第一个行和请求的行数的两个附加参数。When the property is set to `true`, the collection includes two additional parameters for the first row requested and the number of rows requested. 这两个参数的名称定义的和属性。These two parameters are named as defined by the and properties. `Select`方法应返回所请求的指定索引处开始的行数。The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows starting at the specified index. 由于数据可能不按页大小均匀划分，最后一页可能会包含更少的行。Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows. 因此，请求的行数是实际返回的行的最大数目。Thus, the number of rows requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned. 的调用过程中检查属性方法，以确保数据源控件支持所有功能，通过设置的各种请求属性。The property is checked during a call to the method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various properties. 数据绑定控件关联的数据绑定控件上启用了分页，当调用`Select`方法的起始索引和所需的行数。When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required. 此外，如果属性设置，数据绑定控件呈现的页导航控件之前调用的方法。Additionally, if the property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls. 例如，如果控件使用页面大小为 5，启用了分页和方法将返回 20，只有 4 页将显示页导航中。For example, if a control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the method returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承方法从基础数据存储使用业务对象中删除数据。The class implements the inherited method to delete data from an underlying data store using a business object. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不调用方法直接; 相反，使用公开提供方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 执行删除操作之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件，以检查参数的值并执行任何预处理之前调用方法。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and perform any preprocessing before the method is called. 若要执行删除操作，使用反射来调用由标识的方法属性和任何关联中的参数`keys`和`oldValues`集合，然后执行它。To perform a delete operation, the uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters in the `keys` and `oldValues` collections, and then executes it. 在操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes, and to perform any post-processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承方法以将数据插入到基础数据存储使用业务对象。The class implements the inherited method to insert data into an underlying data store using a business object. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不调用方法直接; 相反，使用公开提供方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 执行插入之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the insert is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件，以检查参数的值并执行任何预处理之前调用方法。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and perform any preprocessing before the method is called. 执行插入操作，控件使用反射来调用由标识的方法属性和任何关联中的参数`values`集合，然后执行它。To perform an insert operation, the control uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters that are in the `values` collection, and then executes it. 在操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件，以检查任何返回值，错误代码，并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 返回插入的行数的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on returning the number of rows inserted, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承方法来检索使用业务对象数据。The class implements the inherited method to retrieve data using a business object. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不调用方法直接; 相反，使用公开提供方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 指定的方法可以有任意方法签名，但必须返回的类型之一若要成功调用下表中列出的控件。The specified method can have any method signature, but must return one of the types for the control that are listed in the following table to call it successfully. |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||返回的方法。The is returned by the method.| ||一个使用创建并返回方法。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||第一个的提取和一个是由创建和返回方法。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||该对象包装在一个元素而返回的方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element and returned by the method.| 执行数据检索之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the data retrieval is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行操作前任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 执行选择操作，控件使用反射来调用由标识方法属性和任何关联中的参数集合，然后执行它。To perform a select operation, the control uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters that are in the collection, and then executes it. 在操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes, and to perform any post-processing. 如果方法将返回对象并启用了缓存，检索中的数据，并在操作期间将数据保存到缓存。If the method returns a object and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 创建缓存，放弃或刷新基于指定的组合的缓存行为和属性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. 如果方法将返回对象和一个指定属性，以及提供的所有计算属性和生成的筛选器应用于过程中的数据列表操作。If the method returns a object and a property has been specified, it is evaluated along with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 返回选择的行数的信息，请参阅。For information on returning the number of rows selected, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承方法来更新使用业务对象数据。The class implements the inherited method to update data using a business object. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不调用方法直接; 相反，使用公开提供方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 中包含的值`keys`并`values`集合进行计算并与所包含的任何值合并集合。The values that are contained in the `keys` and `values` collections are evaluated and merged with any values that are contained by the collection. 如果属性设置为值时中, 包含的值`oldValues`集合都将使用属性并合并。If the property is set to the value, the values that are contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the property and are also merged. 执行更新操作之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the update operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行任何预处理之前更新。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an update. 若要执行更新操作，使用反射来调用由标识的方法属性和任何关联中的参数`keys`集合，然后执行它。To perform an update operation, the uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters in the `keys` collection, and then executes it. 在操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件，以检查任何返回值，错误代码，并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 返回更新的行数的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on returning the number of rows updated, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持筛选数据时，才方法将返回， ，或对象。The control supports filtering data only when the method returns a , , or object. 有关使用的语法属性是一个格式字符串样式表达式。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string-style expression. 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法通过接受属性因为对其应用筛选器表达式的属性执行返回的对象方法。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. （有关详细信息，请参阅 。）如果您将参数添加到集合，还可以包含格式字符串的占位符，例如`"{0}"`，在要替换的参数值的表达式。(For more information, see .) If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders, for example `"{0}"`, in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 可以包括在参数。You can include parameters in the . 如果参数的类型是字符串或字符类型，将参数括在单引号内。If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数的数值类型，则不需要引号。集合中包含的参数，其计算结果中找到占位符。Quotation marks are not needed if the parameter is a numeric type.The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders found in the . 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 建议您验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。It is recommended that you validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 在运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选器表达式，并将其应用于返回的对象方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用的属性作为一种安全措施可限制返回，筛选发生之前，必须验证参数值的项的数目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据中间层业务对象中检索数据的控件和一个控件来显示结果。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例中使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据中间层业务对象中检索数据的控件和一个控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 控件可以筛选数据，仅当用于检索数据的方法检索其作为对象。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a object. 出于此原因，属性标识的数据检索为业务对象方法。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a . 代码示例组成、 一个控件，控件，和一个**提交**按钮。The code example consists of a , a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 默认情况下，填入一个 Northwind Traders 员工的名称。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 显示有关中的名称由雇员的信息。The displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the . 若要检索有关另一个雇员的数据在，输入该员工的完整名称，然后单击**提交**按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, in the , enter the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选将检索的数据属性。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the property. 它使用到中包含的参数进行求值的参数占位符集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符受单引号会因为参数类型是字符串类型，可能会包含空格。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型为数值或日期类型，则不需要引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是封装业务逻辑的类。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类，该类是一个包含仅加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic`类创建一组静态的数据，而不是从数据层中检索数据。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 也很有帮助的此示例中，因为此示例依赖于您提供的 Northwind Traders 员工来演示筛选的完整名称。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on you to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译并与 Web 窗体页的代码示例中提供了使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms page code examples that are provided. remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the operation. 参数都可用作访问的集合属性，它公开由对象。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例中使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 数据输入到的字段后控件中，单击**插入**按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识哪一种方法执行操作。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 在此代码示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用于执行 insert; 但是它需要`NorthwindEmployee`参数以插入数据。In this code example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因，集合的字符串控件传递自动是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托处理对象事件并使你能够操作前的输入的参数操作继续进行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因为`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法要求`NorthwindEmployee`对象作为参数，一个是创建使用字符串的集合，然后添加到使用参数名称的集合 (`ne`) 该方法。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings, and then added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 作为数据源使用的类型和方法都不专门用于使用现有的中间层对象时，可能会执行类似这样的步骤控件。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 当执行操作时，由标识的方法调用属性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`对象的方法有包含参数，一个方法签名集合中必须包含具有匹配的方法签名参数的名称的参数方法成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是一个无状态类封装业务逻辑。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类，该类是一个包含仅加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 附加`NorthwindDataException`类提供便利。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此你会将数据插入 Northwind Trader 数据库时使用此示例试验。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. value.span: 一个字符串，表示 用于插入数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to insert data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁指定的方法的每次调用属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 您可以处理事件以使用之前指定的方法的业务对象调用属性。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理指定的方法后，将引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. (`Dispose`业务对象实现时，才会调用接口。)该方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，永远不会创建业务对象，无法处理这些事件。(`Dispose` is called, only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果业务对象对象实现多个方法或函数具有相同名称 （方法重载），尝试调用正确的一组条件，包括中的参数根据数据源控件集合。If the business object that the object implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果中的参数集合与指定的方法不匹配属性签名的数据源将引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the method specified by the property signature, the data source throws an exception. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例中使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 数据输入到的字段后控件中，单击**插入**按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识哪一种方法执行操作。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 在此代码示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用于执行 insert; 但是，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`参数以插入数据。In this code example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因，集合的字符串控件传递自动是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托处理对象事件并使你能够操作前的输入的参数操作继续进行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因为`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法要求`NorthwindEmployee`对象作为参数，一个使用字符串的集合创建，添加到使用参数名称的集合 (`ne`) 该方法。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 作为数据源使用的类型和方法都不专门用于使用现有的中间层对象时，可能会执行类似这样的步骤控件。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 当执行操作时，由标识的方法调用属性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`对象的方法有包含参数，一个方法签名集合中必须包含具有匹配的方法签名参数的名称的参数方法成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the previous code example uses. 代码示例由两个基本类和其他类组成：The code example consists of two basic classes and an additional class: - `EmployeeLogic`类是一个无状态的类，该类封装业务逻辑。The `EmployeeLogic` class is a stateless class, which encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类是一个模型的类，其中包含仅与加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能。The `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class, which contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. - 附加`NorthwindDataException`类提供便利。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此你会将数据插入 Northwind Trader 数据库时使用此代码示例试验。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和类型中包含的参数集合的名称和参数中指定的方法的类型必须匹配属性签名。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 使用提供的参数，如数据绑定控件时并，则控件自动合并具有提供的这些参数的集合中显式指定任何参数数据绑定控件中。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供的示例实现`Insert`第一个代码示例中使用的方法。The second code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 数据输入到的字段后控件中，单击**插入**按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识哪一种方法执行操作。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 如果单击**插入**按钮，使用指定的方法执行操作属性，在中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Insert** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，一个参数中指定集合对应于监督程序的 id。In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the supervisor's ID. 这是因为即使 ID 显示在集合控制作为对象，它将作为字符串传递控件。This is because even though the ID is displayed in the collection for the control as a object, it will be passed as a string to the control. 通过将其添加显式设具有集合属性设置为值，它将传递正确作为方法`int`，不是作为`string`。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property that is set to the value, it will be passed correctly by the to the method as an `int`, not as `string`. 当执行操作时，由标识的方法调用属性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`对象的方法有包含参数，一个方法签名集合中必须包含具有匹配的方法签名参数的名称的参数成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/CS/objds8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/VB/objds8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供的示例实现`Insert`前面的代码示例使用的方法。The following code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that the preceding code example uses. `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper`方法添加到`EmployeeLogic`中间层对象，以使对象可以更轻松地使用Web 方案中，而无需大量重写到实际业务逻辑中的控件。The `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper` method is added to the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier object to enable the object to work more easily with the control in Web scenarios, without a substantial rewrite to the actual business logic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法将还原的视图状态信息对象从保存的上一个页请求方法。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以对业务对象，设置的属性，调用其他方法或执行其他特定于之前的业务对象的初始化控制调用`Data`业务对象的方法。Handle the event to call other methods on the business object, set properties, or to perform other initialization that is specific to the business object before the control calls the `Data` methods for the business object. 访问对对象的引用属性，它公开由对象。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 标识执行数据操作的方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则和永远不会引发事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将自动调用要创建的业务对象，它使用反射的实例的默认构造函数。The control automatically calls the default constructor of a business object to create and instance of it using reflection. 处理事件来显式调用另一个构造函数并将结果传递给对象的实例设置关联的属性对象。Handle the event to explicitly call another constructor and to set the instance of the object that results to the property of the associated object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 标识执行数据操作的方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则和永远不会引发事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 丢弃的业务对象的实例之前引发事件。The event is raised before the instance of the business object is discarded. 如果业务对象实现接口，方法之后调用引发事件。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called after The event is raised. 处理事件以在对象上调用其他方法，并设置属性或执行清理该对象被销毁前的特定于该对象。Handle the event to call other methods on the object and set properties or to perform clean-up that is specific to the object before the object is destroyed. 访问对对象的引用属性，它公开由对象。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 标识执行数据操作的方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则永远不会引发事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the event is never raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字符串应用于为主键，如那些使用标识`DataKeyNames`属性的数据绑定控件或在删除和更新方案，其中属性设置为值和传递给相应的数据方法的原始值的集。The format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios, where the property is set to the value and the set of original values that are passed to the corresponding data method. 两个常见方案中，可能会更改属性如下所示：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 若要区分中更新旧的和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 当属性设置为值，参数对于原始的和新值添加到集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 没有格式设置字符串，将为每个数据字段创建具有相同名称的两个参数。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 通过更改原始值参数的名称，您可以比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并比较键值的数据。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 某些可视化设计器实现原始值和密钥的特定命名的方案。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys. 值存储在视图状态。The value of the is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，使用指定的方法执行操作属性，在中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委托调用以处理事件之前执行操作，和`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托调用以处理事件之后操作完成后，为执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是抛出，它由处理此委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查的实现`EmployeeLogic`中间层业务对象，它将使用此代码示例，请参阅。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，使用指定的方法执行操作属性，在中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委托调用以处理事件之前执行操作，和`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托调用以处理事件之后操作完成后，为执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是抛出，它由处理此委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查的实现`EmployeeLogic`中间层业务对象，它将使用此代码示例，请参阅。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后， 对象的视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state for the object since the time when the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象；否则，如果没有与对象关联的视图状态，则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是累积的服务器控件的属性的值。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值被自动放入服务器控件，这是实例属性的类。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 值随后会保存到一个字符串对象后的服务器控件生存期的保存状态阶段。The value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态时，视图状态内容返回到客户端为存储在对应的 HTML 中的变量`Hidden`元素。When view state is saved, view state contents are returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 如果您创作的自定义服务器控件，您可以通过重写提高效率方法并修改`ViewState`服务器控件的属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件检查返回值的值和输出参数，或若要确定数据检索操作完成后是否引发了异常。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a data retrieval operation has completed. 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性中有与事件相关联的对象。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可以有任意方法签名，但必须返回一个按顺序为下表中所列的类型控件才能成功调用The specified method can have any method signature but must return one of the types listed in the following table in order for the control to call it successfully |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||返回的方法。The is returned by the method.| ||一个使用创建并返回方法。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||第一个的提取和一个是由创建和返回方法。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||该对象包装在一个元素而返回的方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element and returned by the method.| 通过标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，创建和销毁每次业务对象调用方法。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method is called. 您可以处理事件以使用之前指定的方法的业务对象调用属性。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理指定的方法后，将引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. (`Dispose`业务对象实现时，才会调用接口。)该方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，永远不会创建业务对象，无法处理这些事件。(`Dispose` is called only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果业务对象控件的工作方式与实现多个方法或函数具有相同名称 （方法重载），尝试调用正确的一组条件，其中包括参数根据数据源控件在集合。If the business object that the control works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果中的参数集合与指定的方法的签名不匹配属性，数据源引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the signature of the method specified by the property, the data source throws an exception. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何控件可以显示数据使用Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 标识的部分或完全限定的类名称及其属性和方法调用以检索与数据其属性。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在运行时，创建对象并使用反射调用该方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控件枚举返回的集合，然后显示数据。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the , and then displays the data. If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果业务对象对象的工作原理与实现多个方法或函数具有相同名称 （方法重载），尝试调用正确的一组条件，其中包括参数根据数据源控件在集合。If the business object that the object works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果中的参数集合与指定的方法的签名不匹配属性，数据源引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the signature of the method specified by the property, the data source throws an exception. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件和多个控件更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示的名称`NorthwindEmployee`，而控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a `NorthwindEmployee`, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因为集合中包含绑定到的所选值的对象，将触发的按钮选择某个员工后才启用的操作。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that triggers the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和类型中包含的参数集合的名称和参数中指定的方法的类型必须匹配属性签名。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 受影响的参数名称属性，并且区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case sensitive. 使用提供的参数，如数据绑定控件时并，则控件自动合并具有提供的这些参数的集合中显式指定任何参数数据绑定控件中。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件和多个控件更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示的名称`NorthwindEmployee`，而控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a `NorthwindEmployee`, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因为集合中包含绑定到的所选值的对象，将触发的按钮选择某个员工后才启用的操作。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that triggers the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the operation. 参数都可用作集合，访问属性，它公开由对象。The parameters are available as an collection, accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件和多个控件更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示的名称`NorthwindEmployee`，而控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a `NorthwindEmployee`, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因为集合中包含绑定到的所选值的对象，将触发的按钮选择某个员工后才启用的操作。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that triggers the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected.
